controller
Class TrainController

java.lang.Object
  controller.TrainController

public class TrainController
extends java.lang.Object

The TrainController class is responsible for all communications between the trains and the rest of the software.

                         boolean isAtStation,
                         boolean used,
                         int pos,
                         java.lang.String posType)
Set all data for the train, when the value equals -1 or null it is ignored

Parameters:
trainId - - A unique key to indentify the train
endPoint - - The endpoint for this train (this value is key from the track array)
sleepTime - - time in miliseconds between two actions of the train
startPoint - - The startpoint for this train (this value is key from the track array)
isAtStation - -
used - -
